member.name: F:ScreenGrab6.Collage.sys_setWindowPos.SetWindowPosFlags.SynchronousWindowPosition
member.summary: If the calling thread and the thread that owns the window are attached to different input queues, the system posts the request to the thread that owns the window. This prevents the calling thread from blocking its execution while other threads process the request.

member.name: F:ScreenGrab6.Collage.sys_setWindowPos.SetWindowPosFlags.DeferErase
member.summary: Prevents generation of the WM_SYNCPAINT message.

member.name: F:ScreenGrab6.Collage.sys_setWindowPos.SetWindowPosFlags.DrawFrame
member.summary: Draws a frame (defined in the window's class description) around the window.

member.name: F:ScreenGrab6.Collage.sys_setWindowPos.SetWindowPosFlags.FrameChanged
member.summary: Applies new frame styles set using the SetWindowLong function. Sends a WM_NCCALCSIZE message to the window, even if the window's size is not being changed. If this flag is not specified, WM_NCCALCSIZE is sent only when the window's size is being changed.

member.name: F:ScreenGrab6.Collage.sys_setWindowPos.SetWindowPosFlags.HideWindow
member.summary: Hides the window.

member.name: F:ScreenGrab6.Collage.sys_setWindowPos.SetWindowPosFlags.DoNotActivate
member.summary: Does not activate the window. If this flag is not set, the window is activated and moved to the top of either the topmost or non-topmost group (depending on the setting of the hWndInsertAfter parameter).

member.name: F:ScreenGrab6.Collage.sys_setWindowPos.SetWindowPosFlags.DoNotCopyBits
member.summary: Discards the entire contents of the client area. If this flag is not specified, the valid contents of the client area are saved and copied back into the client area after the window is sized or repositioned.

member.name: F:ScreenGrab6.Collage.sys_setWindowPos.SetWindowPosFlags.IgnoreMove
member.summary: Retains the current position (ignores X and Y parameters).

member.name: F:ScreenGrab6.Collage.sys_setWindowPos.SetWindowPosFlags.DoNotChangeOwnerZOrder
member.summary: Does not change the owner window's position in the Z order.

member.name: F:ScreenGrab6.Collage.sys_setWindowPos.SetWindowPosFlags.DoNotRedraw
member.summary: Does not redraw changes. If this flag is set, no repainting of any kind occurs. This applies to the client area, the nonclient area (including the title bar and scroll bars), and any part of the parent window uncovered as a result of the window being moved. When this flag is set, the application must explicitly invalidate or redraw any parts of the window and parent window that need redrawing.

member.name: F:ScreenGrab6.Collage.sys_setWindowPos.SetWindowPosFlags.DoNotReposition
member.summary: Same as the SWP_NOOWNERZORDER flag.

member.name: F:ScreenGrab6.Collage.sys_setWindowPos.SetWindowPosFlags.DoNotSendChangingEvent
member.summary: Prevents the window from receiving the WM_WINDOWPOSCHANGING message.

member.name: F:ScreenGrab6.Collage.sys_setWindowPos.SetWindowPosFlags.IgnoreResize
member.summary: Retains the current size (ignores the cx and cy parameters).

member.name: F:ScreenGrab6.Collage.sys_setWindowPos.SetWindowPosFlags.IgnoreZOrder
member.summary: Retains the current Z order (ignores the hWndInsertAfter parameter).

member.name: F:ScreenGrab6.Collage.sys_setWindowPos.SetWindowPosFlags.ShowWindow
member.summary: Displays the window.

member.name: M:ScreenGrab6.Collage.JSON.JsonDecode(System.String)
member.summary: Parses the string json into a value
member.returns: An ArrayList, a Hashtable, a double, a string, null, true, or false

member.name: M:ScreenGrab6.Collage.JSON.JsonDecode(System.String,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Parses the string json into a value; and fills 'success' with the successfullness of the parse.
member.returns: An ArrayList, a Hashtable, a double, a string, null, true, or false

member.name: M:ScreenGrab6.Collage.JSON.JsonEncode(System.Object)
member.summary: Converts a Hashtable / ArrayList object into a JSON string
member.returns: A JSON encoded string, or null if object 'json' is not serializable

member.name: M:ScreenGrab6.Collage.JSON.IsNumeric(System.Object)
member.summary:
Determines if a given object is numeric in any way (can be integer, double, null, etc).
Thanks to mtighe for pointing out Double.TryParse to me.

member.name: T:ScreenGrab6.Collage.JSON
member.summary:
This class encodes and decodes JSON strings. Spec. details, see http://www.json.org/
JSON uses Arrays and Objects. These correspond here to the datatypes ArrayList and Hashtable. All numbers are parsed to doubles.

member.name: F:ScreenGrab6.Collage.app_winVista.WTNCA_NODRAWCAPTION
member.summary: Do Not Draw The Caption (Text)

member.name: F:ScreenGrab6.Collage.app_winVista.WTNCA_NODRAWICON
member.summary: Do Not Draw the Icon

member.name: F:ScreenGrab6.Collage.app_winVista.WTNCA_NOSYSMENU
member.summary: Do Not Show the System Menu

member.name: F:ScreenGrab6.Collage.app_winVista.WTNCA_NOMIRRORHELP
member.summary: Do Not Mirror the Question mark Symbol

member.name: T:ScreenGrab6.Collage.app_winVista.WTA_OPTIONS
member.summary: The Options of What Attributes to Add/Remove

member.name: T:ScreenGrab6.Collage.app_winVista.WindowThemeAttributeType
member.summary: What Type of Attributes? (Only One is Currently Defined)

member.name: M:ScreenGrab6.Collage.app_winVista.SetWindowThemeAttribute(System.IntPtr,ScreenGrab6.Collage.app_winVista.WindowThemeAttributeType,ScreenGrab6.Collage.app_winVista.WTA_OPTIONS@,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Set The Window's Theme Attributes
member.param: The Size of the Attributes Struct
member.returns: If The Call Was Successful or Not

member.name: F:ScreenGrab6.Collage.app_winVista.DeviceContextValues.Window
member.summary: DCX_WINDOW: Returns a DC that corresponds to the window rectangle rather than the client rectangle.

member.name: F:ScreenGrab6.Collage.app_winVista.DeviceContextValues.Cache
member.summary: DCX_CACHE: Returns a DC from the cache, rather than the OWNDC or CLASSDC window. Essentially overrides CS_OWNDC and CS_CLASSDC.

member.name: F:ScreenGrab6.Collage.app_winVista.DeviceContextValues.NoResetAttrs
member.summary: DCX_NORESETATTRS: Does not reset the attributes of this DC to the default attributes when this DC is released.

member.name: F:ScreenGrab6.Collage.app_winVista.DeviceContextValues.ClipChildren
member.summary: DCX_CLIPCHILDREN: Excludes the visible regions of all child windows below the window identified by hWnd.

member.name: F:ScreenGrab6.Collage.app_winVista.DeviceContextValues.ClipSiblings
member.summary: DCX_CLIPSIBLINGS: Excludes the visible regions of all sibling windows above the window identified by hWnd.

member.name: F:ScreenGrab6.Collage.app_winVista.DeviceContextValues.ParentClip
member.summary: DCX_PARENTCLIP: Uses the visible region of the parent window. The parent's WS_CLIPCHILDREN and CS_PARENTDC style bits are ignored. The origin is set to the upper-left corner of the window identified by hWnd.

member.name: F:ScreenGrab6.Collage.app_winVista.DeviceContextValues.ExcludeRgn
member.summary: DCX_EXCLUDERGN: The clipping region identified by hrgnClip is excluded from the visible region of the returned DC.

member.name: F:ScreenGrab6.Collage.app_winVista.DeviceContextValues.IntersectRgn
member.summary: DCX_INTERSECTRGN: The clipping region identified by hrgnClip is intersected with the visible region of the returned DC.

member.name: F:ScreenGrab6.Collage.app_winVista.DeviceContextValues.ExcludeUpdate
member.summary: DCX_EXCLUDEUPDATE: Unknown...Undocumented

member.name: F:ScreenGrab6.Collage.app_winVista.DeviceContextValues.IntersectUpdate
member.summary: DCX_INTERSECTUPDATE: Unknown...Undocumented

member.name: F:ScreenGrab6.Collage.app_winVista.DeviceContextValues.LockWindowUpdate
member.summary: DCX_LOCKWINDOWUPDATE: Allows drawing even if there is a LockWindowUpdate call in effect that would otherwise exclude this window. Used for drawing during tracking.

member.name: F:ScreenGrab6.Collage.app_winVista.DeviceContextValues.Validate
member.summary: DCX_VALIDATE When specified with DCX_INTERSECTUPDATE, causes the DC to be completely validated. Using this function with both DCX_INTERSECTUPDATE and DCX_VALIDATE is identical to using the BeginPaint function.

member.name: T:ScreenGrab6.Collage.app_winVista.DeviceContextValues
member.summary: Values to pass to the GetDCEx method.

member.name: M:ScreenGrab6.Collage.app_winVista.TextBoxGlassDrawer.RedrawControlAsBitmap(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Redraws a given control as a bitmap ontop of itself.

member.name: P:ScreenGrab6.Collage.ScreenArea.LeftMostBound
member.summary: Gets the least "x" coordinate of all screens on the system

member.name: P:ScreenGrab6.Collage.ScreenArea.RightMostBound
member.summary: Gets the greatest "x" coordinate of all screens on the system

member.name: P:ScreenGrab6.Collage.ScreenArea.TopMostBound
member.summary: Gets the least "y" coordinate of all screens on the system

member.name: P:ScreenGrab6.Collage.ScreenArea.BottomMostBound
member.summary: Gets the greatest "y" coordinate of all screens on the system

member.name: P:ScreenGrab6.Collage.ScreenArea.MaximumWidth
member.summary: Gets the width of the screen with the highest resolution.
member.returns: The width of the screen with the highest resolution.

member.name: P:ScreenGrab6.Collage.ScreenArea.MinimumWidth
member.summary: Gets the width of the screen with the lowest resolution.
member.returns: The width of the screen with the lowest resolution.

member.name: P:ScreenGrab6.Collage.ScreenArea.MaximumHeight
member.summary: Gets the height of the screen with the highest resolution.
member.returns: The height of the screen with the highest resolution.

member.name: P:ScreenGrab6.Collage.ScreenArea.MinimumHeight
member.summary: Gets the height of the screen with the lowest resolution.
member.returns: The height of the screen with the lowest resolution.

member.name: P:ScreenGrab6.Collage.ScreenArea.TotalWidth
member.summary: Gets the total width of all the screens relative to their arrangement.
member.returns: The total width of all the screens relative to their arrangement.

member.name: P:ScreenGrab6.Collage.ScreenArea.TotalHeight
member.summary: Gets the total height of all the screens relative to their arrangement.
member.returns: The total height of all the screens relative to their arrangement.

member.name: T:ScreenGrab6.Collage.ScreenArea
member.summary: Returns screen area statistics and capture functionality for all connected screens.

member.name: M:ScreenGrab6.Collage.ColorExtensions.GetNearestName(System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Gets the System.Drawing.Color.Name of the closest matching color.

example.code: Private Sub Example() Dim oColor As Color = Color.FromName(GetNearestName(Color.FromArgb(255, 255, 255, 0))) Debug.Assert(oColor.Name = "Yellow") End Sub

member.name: M:ScreenGrab6.Collage.ColorExtensions.GetNearestKnownColor(System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Gets the System.Drawing.KnownColor of the closest matching known color.

example.code: Private Sub Example() Dim oColor As Color = Color.FromKnownColor(GetNearestKnownColor(Color.FromArgb(255, 255, 255, 0))) Debug.Assert(oColor.Name = "Yellow") End Sub

member.name: M:ScreenGrab6.Collage.ColorExtensions.ColorName.ToRGBString
member.summary: Returns RGB=(212,208,200)
